title:
11c09 - Construction:
missile launching sites.
text:
The construction of
ballistic missile launching sites, sometimes referred to as “complexes” or pads,
constitutes an improvement or extension of existing facilities of interstate
commerce and is thus individually covered.
html: The construction of ballistic missile launching sites, sometimes referred to as “complexes” or pads, constitutes an improvement or extension of existing facilities of interstate commerce and is thus individually covered.
